items.en: Guardiola's 'special' win over Liverpool in 1,000th game
items.text_for_match: Guardiola's 'special' win over Liverpool in 1,000th game Pep Guardiola believes "the universe dictated" that his 1,000th game as a manager had to be against Liverpool, as the Spaniard savoured a 3-0 win on his landmark day in the dugout. Pep Guardiola believes "the universe dictated" that his 1,000th game as a manager had to be against Liverpool, as the Spaniard savoured a 3-0 win on his landmark day in the dugout.
